title: User Authentication Success with Email
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign up and log in using email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-up page
Enter valid email and password
Submit sign-up form
Confirm account creation and redirect to dashboard
Log out
Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and password
Click login button
Verify login success and landing on dashboard

title: User Authentication Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login failure when incorrect password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and incorrect password
Click login button
Confirm login is denied with proper error message

title: OAuth Login with Google Account
description: Verify users can authenticate using Google OAuth login option.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on Google OAuth login button
Complete Google authentication flow
Verify user is logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: Real-time Dashboard Data Update
description: Verify that live air quality and pollution data updates on dashboard within 5 seconds using Socket.io.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to dashboard
Simulate real-time sensor data input via Socket.io
Check that dashboard displays updated data within 5 seconds

title: Emergency Alert Manual Trigger
description: Verify manual triggering of emergency alerts produces visual, audible, and vibration notifications on supported devices.

steps.description: Log in and open Emergency Command Center
Manually trigger an emergency alert
Confirm alert popup, audible alarm, and vibration occur on device

title: Emergency Alert Auto Detection and Triggering
description: Verify that emergency alerts are automatically triggered based on sensor data thresholds.

steps.description: Log in and monitor Emergency Command Center
Simulate sensor data exceeding critical pollution thresholds
Confirm auto-triggered emergency alert with visual and audible feedback

title: AI-Generated Pollution Reduction Tips Accuracy
description: Verify that AI generates pollution reduction tips that logically correlate with current pollution levels and update dynamically.

steps.description: Log in and go to dashboard displaying current pollution data
Verify AI-generated tips are shown for present pollution conditions
Change pollution data input to simulate different pollution scenarios
Check that AI tips update appropriately and remain relevant

title: User Profile Management - Update and Persist Changes
description: Verify users can update and save profile information securely and changes persist on reload.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to profile settings page
Edit profile fields such as username, email, and preferences
Save changes
Confirm changes are persisted and reflected after page reload

title: API Endpoint Authentication Enforcement
description: Verify that secure API endpoints reject unauthorized requests and accept authorized ones with valid tokens.

steps.description: Send API request to protected endpoint without authentication token
Verify access is denied with proper error code
Send API request with valid authentication token and proper permissions
Verify data is returned and access is granted

title: Community Features - Post Creation and Leaderboard Update
description: Verify users can create social posts, join challenges, and leaderboard updates accordingly.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to community page
Create and submit a new social post
Confirm post appears in community feed
Join an active community challenge
Verify user appears in leaderboard with correct challenge points

title: Pollution Heatmap Visualization Accuracy
description: Verify geographic pollution heatmaps display accurate and up-to-date pollution levels with correct color coding.

steps.description: Access pollution map page
Load pollution data for geographic regions
Confirm heatmap colors correspond to pollution intensity as per thresholds
Update pollution data to reflect changes
Verify heatmap visuals refresh and update accordingly

title: Third-party Integration and Webhook Processing
description: Verify that third-party integrations sync data correctly and webhook events are processed with real-time responses and no errors.

steps.description: Configure and activate a third-party integration with valid credentials
Trigger webhook events from the third-party system
Confirm webhook events are received and processed successfully by the platform
Verify data in platform syncs correctly with third-party system

title: Dashboard Lazy Loading and Performance
description: Verify that dashboards utilize lazy loading and code splitting to maintain smooth user experience and efficient loading times.

steps.description: Navigate to optimized dashboard page
Confirm initial load is quick and only essential components are loaded
Scroll and interact with various UI components requiring lazy loading
Verify additional components load dynamically without performance issues

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that different user roles have permissions enforced correctly for sensitive actions like managing sensors, alerts, and user profiles.

steps.description: Log in as regular user
Attempt to access admin-only API endpoints and UI controls
Verify access is denied
Log in as admin user
Access and perform management actions on sensors and user profiles
Confirm actions succeed as expected

title: System Monitoring and Error Logging
description: Verify system monitoring logs error, usage data and produces actionable alerts with minimal false positives.

steps.description: Simulate sensor malfunctions and invalid data injections
Confirm system logs errors and generates alerts with correct severity
Simulate normal operation with expected data
Verify monitoring produces no false positive alerts

title: Theme Customization and Persistence
description: Verify users can change UI themes and preferences persist across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to theme settings
Change theme setting to dark mode
Confirm UI switches to dark mode immediately
Refresh or reopen application
Verify dark mode theme preference persists

title: API Pagination and Data Schema Validation
description: Verify that API endpoints return paginated data matching documented schema for user profiles, sensors, and pollution data.

steps.description: Send API requests for user profiles/sensors/pollution data with pagination parameters
Confirm responses are paginated correctly with total counts and page metadata
Verify response data conforms to expected schema and field types

title: Social Posts Editing and Deletion
description: Verify that users can edit and delete their own social posts with validation and confirmation.

steps.description: Create a new social post
Edit the post content and save changes
Confirm updated post content appears in community feed
Delete the social post
Confirm post is removed from community feed

title: Educational Content Access and Interaction
description: Verify authenticated users can access educational resources and interact with content (e.g., quizzes, videos).

steps.description: Log in and navigate to educational content section
Select an educational module to view
Confirm correct content loads and displays
Interact with content, e.g., answer quiz or mark as completed
Verify interactions are recorded and saved

title: Deployment Environment Variables and Startup Health Check
description: Verify deployment procedure completes with all environment variables set and services report healthy status on startup.

steps.description: Deploy the application to a new environment with configured environment variables
Confirm deployment completes successfully without errors
Check health endpoints/services report healthy and responsive
